short_summary: Request for Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of a variety of lumber to 5th Canadian Division Support Base (5 CDSB) Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick
description: The User needs the procurement document in CSV. for the particular UTF-8 encoded contract
full_summary:
**RISO Lumber Supply Request for Proposal**
=====================================================

**Tender Reference Number:** PW-_MCT-047-6262
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** W2037-230020/01/A
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-26
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-10-31T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2023-05-16

**Summary:**
The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a proposal for the Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of various types of lumber to the 5th Canadian Division Support Base (5 CDSB) Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick.

**Goods and Services:**
The RISO covers the supply of lumber as and when required, from Standing Offer issued to 31 October 2024 inclusive, divided into six rebid periods for six standing offer periods of four months each.

**Instructions to Offerors:**
Offerors must submit a proposal for each period as per the Schedule of Tender Closing Dates in Annex C. The Page 1 of the Tender Document for each tender closing date are included at Annex C. Offerors may bid on any period of their choice.

**Evaluation Procedure and Basis of Selection:**
Only one Standing Offer will be issued to the lowest aggregate bid, total extended cost of all items.

**Technical and Contractual Inquiries:**
All inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature must be submitted in writing to the Contractual Authority: Maryse Cyr at maryse.cyr@pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Supporting Documents and Tender Submission:**
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted as per date and time identified in Annex C.

**Language of the Tender:**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**
Cyr (MCT), Maryse
Contact Person: (506) 377-4894
cyrmaryse.cyr@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca

This official website contain official language of Canada.  Your comments, notes and letters regarding this publication will be important to us. Please use the following address, phone number, facsimile number or e-mail to contact us.



Published by:
Service Innovation of Public Services and Procurement Canada, 11th Floor, Place du Portage, 140 O'Connor
